snippet: Ms. Chookasian, praised for her immense and velvety voice, was a principal singer with the Metropolitan Opera, appearing there 290 times from 1962 to 1986.
abstract: Lili Chookasian, prominent American contralto, dies at age 90.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Chookasian, praised for her immense and velvety voice, was a principal singer with the Metropolitan Opera, appearing there 290 times from 1962 to 1986.

headline.seo: Lili Chookasian, Opera Singer, Dies at 90
headline.main: Lili Chookasian, Contralto Praised for Her Velvety Voice, Dies at 90
headline.print_headline: Lili Chookasian, 90, Contralto Praised for Her Velvety Voice
